last_episode_to_air.overview: With a massive attack on the horizon, the Tawaras must band together to save their family, honor and many lives before a solar eclipse.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Eclipse

name: House of Ninjas
original_name: 忍びの家 House of Ninjas
overview: Years after retiring from their formidable ninja lives, a dysfunctional family must return to shadowy missions to counteract a string of looming threats.

episodes.name: The Offer
episodes.overview: While Haru Tawara develops a crush on a mysterious young woman at work, an unusual opportunity arises at his father's financially struggling brewery.

episodes.name: The Trail
episodes.overview: Haru accompanies Karen to investigate a whistleblower's apartment. Meanwhile, several other Tawaras are tempted to step out of their ordinary lives.

episodes.name: The Flower
episodes.overview: As Haru and Yoko's respective missions take unexpected turns, Nagi's mischievous adventures start attracting unwanted attention.

episodes.name: The Resurrection
episodes.overview: Karen confides in Haru about a longstanding suspicion. In the meantime, Soichi receives a shocking phone call that keeps him up at night.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.overview: As Riku probes into his family's secrets, information about Gentenkai — a peculiar cult — reminds the Tawaras of a tragedy from six years ago.

episodes.name: The Stranger
episodes.overview: An unexpected reunion stirs up more questions at the Tawara household. Soichi and Yoko inch closer to a sinister conspiracy.

episodes.name: The Trade
episodes.overview: To save Karen's life, Haru makes a promise to Hama-san. Riku, Nagi, and their grandmother face an unprecedented challenge at home.

episodes.name: The Eclipse
episodes.overview: With a massive attack on the horizon, the Tawaras must band together to save their family, honor and many lives before a solar eclipse.
